original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa
translated: The Paṭṭhāna🔽The Dhamma Paccaya Table

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽10.11. Vipākattikādi, Hetuduka🔽Navipākaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… navipākadhammadhammaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā bāttiṁsa, ārammaṇe sattavīsa, adhipatiyā ekūnatiṁsa …pe… aññamaññe tiṁsa …pe… vipāke pañcavīsa …pe… avigate bāttiṁsa.🔽Naupādinnupādāniyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naanupādinnupādāniyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naanupādinnaanupādāniyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  vipākattika ādi  na vipākam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na vipāka dhamma dhammam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na nevavipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammam na hetum dhammam paṭicca  hetuyā bāttisa ārammaṇe sattavīsa adhipatiyā ekūnatisa pe aññamaññe tisa pe vipāke pañcavīsa pe avigate bāttisa  na aupādinnupādāniyam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na anupādinnupādāniyam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na anupādinna anupādāniyam na hetum dhammam paṭicca
translated: The Triad and Duad Tables🔽With respect to a non-resultant-by-contact, non-root-cause dhamma … With respect to a resultant-by-contact, non-root-cause dhamma … With respect to a non-resultant-by-contact, non-resultant-by-ineffective-action, non-root-cause dhamma … (Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… āsevane sattarasa …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa adhipatiyā ekavīsa pe āsevane sattarasa pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. analyzed: na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na a saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na a saṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikam na hetum dhammam paṭicca  hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke ekavīsa pe avigate ekūnatisa  na sa vitakka sa vicāram na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na avitakka vicāra mattam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na avitakka avicāram na hetum dhammam paṭicca  hetuyā aṭṭhacattālīsa ārammaṇe pañcacattālīsa adhipatiyā sattacattālīsa pe purejāte āsevane catucattālīsa pe avigate aṭṭhacattālīsa
translated: a non-defiled-but-subject-to-defilement condition … a non-defiled-and-not-subject-to-defilement condition … a neither-defiled-nor-not-defiled condition … (Abbreviated.)

analyzed: na dassanena pahātabbam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na bhāvanāya pahātabbam na hetu

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca pe na na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbam na hetum dhammam paṭicca
translated: With given-up-by-seeing-the-four-noble-truths as condition, a root …🔽With given-up-by-development as condition, a root …

original: …pe… nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ🔽nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ nahetuṁ🔽dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: pe na dassanena pahātabba hetukam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetuka  na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam na hetu  dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta
translated: With given-up-by-seeing-the-four-noble-truths-and-by-development as condition, a root …🔽(Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā ekatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa
translated: With root cause as condition, thirty-one; with object as condition, twenty-four … with result as condition, nine … with pre-nascence as condition, twenty-four … with presence as condition, twenty-four … with non-disappearance as condition, twenty-four.🔽With non-accumulation as condition, a non-root …🔽With non-dissipation as condition, a non-root …

original: Naācayagāmiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naapacayagāmiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca🔽…pe… nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: na ācaya gāmim na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na apacaya gāmim na hetum dhammam paṭicca  pe na neva ācaya gāminā apacaya gāmim na hetum dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā
translated: With non-accumulation-and-non-dissipation as condition, a non-root …🔽(Abbreviated.)

original: ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa
translated: With root cause as condition, twenty-four; with object as condition, twenty-four … with result as condition, nine … with pre-nascence as condition, twenty-four … with presence as condition, twenty-four … with non-disappearance as condition, twenty-four.

original: Nasekkhaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasekkhaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ
analyzed: na sekkham na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na asekkham na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na nevasekkha na asekkha
translated: Dependent on a non-learner cause … Dependent on a non-non-learner cause … Dependent on neither a learner nor a non-learner cause … (Abbreviated.)

original: nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe…
analyzed: na hetum dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe
translated: Thirty-nine in the root cause, twenty-four in the object …

original: vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.🔽Naparittaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… namahaggataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naappamāṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa  na parittam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na mahaggatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na appamāṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta
translated: Nine in the result … Thirty-nine in the unobscured.🔽Dependent on a non-limited cause … Dependent on a non-exalted cause … Dependent on a non-measureless cause … (Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā bāttiṁsa, ārammaṇe sattavīsa …pe… aññamaññe tiṁsa …pe… purejāte āsevane catuvīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā bāttisa ārammaṇe sattavīsa pe aññamaññe tisa pe purejāte āsevane catuvīsa
translated: Thirty-six in the root cause, twenty-seven in the object … Thirty in the reciprocal … Twenty-four in the prenascence condition and the support condition.

original: Naparittārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… namahaggatārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naappamāṇārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na paritta ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na mahaggata ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na appamāṇa ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca
translated: Dependent on a non-limited object … Dependent on a non-exalted object … Dependent on a non-measureless object …

original: Nahīnaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… namajjhimaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… napaṇītaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa … vipāke ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.🔽Namicchattaniyataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasammattaniyataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naaniyataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.🔽Namaggārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… namaggahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… namaggādhipatiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na hīnam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na majjhimam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na paṇītam na hetum dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta  hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa vipāke ekavīsa pe avigate ekūnatisa  na micchatta niyatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na sammatta niyatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na aniyatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta  hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa  na magga ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na magga hetukam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na magga adhipatim na hetum dhammam paṭicca
translated: … a non-inferior, non-cause … a non-middling, non-cause … a non-superior, non-cause … (In brief.)

original: Naanuppannaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nauppādiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na anuppannam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na auppādim na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: Naatītaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naanāgataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Naatītārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naanāgatārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… napaccuppannārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na atītam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na anāgatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca  na atīta ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na anāgata ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na paccuppanna ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca
translated: He does not take as a basis the past, nor the future, nor the signless element.🔽He does not take as a basis the signless element that is past, nor that is future, nor that is present.🔽He does not take as a basis the signless element that is internal, nor that is external, nor that is both internal and external.

original: Naajjhattaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nabahiddhā nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Naajjhattārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na ajjhattam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na bahiddhā na hetum dhammam paṭicca 🔽na ajjhatta ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na bahiddha ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca
translated: He does not take as a basis the signless element that is internal, nor that is external, nor that is both internal and external.
